title: Malzahar Skin Bug
body: With The Snow day Malzahar skin that i bought (Snow Day Malzahar) i bought it when it was released and loved the recall since then i noticed in a recent malzahar game i played that when you recall with him the void poro that you create shows up as a solid blue color Riot fix it please we love our Void Poros!! =D

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! ^-^ We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!

Hey Riot KateyKhaos!

 As you know patch 6.5 is soon and this bug isn't listed as fixed in the notes so will it be fixed be then? Just Wondering, Thanks! (:
Gah, looking at the bug ticket, it looks like it didn't make it for 6.5 due to the fix we had failing. Lemme poke the bug again to get more eyes on this.
Alright Sounds Great! Tell me how it goes! ^-^
Just checked again - this may actually be fixed! :D
Great to hear!! Thanks a lot!!! When will the fix be released?
It's in 6.5. :D You should have it in your client right meow.~
Was that a super troopers joke or a meowkai pun..?
